clip.quote: People care very much when you demonstrate that you care for them and that you've taken time to look, build it into your life, that their lives are important.
clip.why_clipworthy: It highlights the importance of personal connection in client relationships.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to build lasting client relationships? Here's the secret.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Want to build lasting client relationships? Here's the secret.",
    "SETUP": "In today's market, connecting with clients is more crucial than ever. Carrie McCormick shares why personal touch matters.",
    "INSIGHT": "People care very much when you demonstrate that you care for them and that you've taken time to look, build it into your life, that their lives are important.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "By genuinely investing in your clients' lives, you create trust and loyalty. Make it a part of your daily routine.",
    "CTA": "Think about one way you can show a client you care today. Share your ideas in the comments!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "The secret to lasting client relationships? Genuine care and connection. #RealEstate",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstate", "#ClientRelationships", "#BusinessGrowth", "#MarketInsights", "#CarrieMcCormick"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```
